pageContext.description: Remains of wooden shaft in socket. Rather thin metal. Several holes. Edges sharp.
pageContext.patina: Dark brown over dull brown surface. Patches of reddish rusty matter.
pageContext.other: Width: blade 38mm; socket 27mm,Thickness: socket 27mm; blade 14mm,Weight: 102.76 gms
pageContext.associations: Hoard S E of Wrekin. Part of sword + 5 spearheads. (Part of the hoard.)
pageContext.publications: Dukes (1834), Arch XXVI, 464-5.,Hartshorne, "Salopia Antiqua", (1841), pp. 94-7 (Plate facing p. 96). Description does not accord but might well refer to No. 4.
pageContext.site: England,Shropshire,Little Wenlock,Willow Moor,1834 (spring),in a marshy field
pageContext.toSearch: Little Wenlock, Telford, Telford And Wrekin Tf6, UK
